attributes.action: ban drivers for life for using a mobile phone whilst driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day I go out- walking or driving, I see at least 3 people using their mobiles whilst driving. The recent penalty increase has obviously not worked. I have been touched and angered by the recent death of Victoria Mcbryde- who was killed by a driver who had been texting and phoning whilst driving at 70mph. I cannot find the petition from Victorias` family on the PMs web site, so I have started another now, after I heard Victorias family on BBC PM programme. I do hope Victorias family are upset by my action. Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
